features: 🚗 【LIFELIKE BODY WAVE】Transmitting the friction power ( no battery needed) from the wheels to the upper body of the car. Creating a body wave to imitate a real monster truck running on the uneven surface. Easy to play for kids. Kids just pull the monster truck back and let it go as they want.

🚗 【DURABLE HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL】Made with ABS sturdy plastic that ensures the intense play by toddlers and kids. With shockproof protection that protects the body and avoids the crash. With 4 shockproof spring, and rubber tires that make the driving smoother even on uneven roads. Push n go!

🚗 【COLORFUL GRAFFITI PAINTING】Stimulate toddlers' colour recognition and imagination with this eye-catching 3-pack mini monster truck combo that comes in a different vibrant color that will surely liven up any kid’s room or toy box! An exquisite gift for Christmas, birthday

🚗 【360 ROTATING STUNT】Kids will be surprised by the upright running and 360° rotating stunt! Revolving the wheels and putting the vehicle upright, you can see the hot rotating wheel trick! Amazing designs for boys and girls. It can be played on any ground with ease and confidence, be it in sand, grass, muddy patches or rocky trial paths. Splash-proof and weather-proof. Suitable for your kids or toy cars lover.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About CozyBomB Being one of the leading brands for kids product, CozyBomB is committed to providing kids with surprise, excitement, and imagination.

A SUPER EASY TO OPERATE, Friction Powered, No Battery Required Monster Truck Just push the friction car forward then let it go and it will run a long distance. No battery required. Perfectly designed for kids aged 3+ for them to easily operate it. No complicated winding and complex remote controls. The children can play vehicles freely and safely without parents' or any adults supervision. What’s best is that the monster toy cars come in handy and can be put in any bag or pouch which means the children can take the toys wherever they want to go.

BRING COLORFUL MONSTER TRUCKS TO KIDS! - Under industrial-standardized quality control, defective rate is minimized, yet still possible - Find us for replacement or refund if defectiveness is found on the day of arrival - Small parts included. Playing under parent instruction. Not suitable for children under age 2 WHY COZYBOMB? ✔️ Designed by The Hong Kong Designer Group ✔️ We select the best combo of toys ✔️ Strong customer support

ComBo Included Monster Truck x 3 or 4 (Graffiti Cover with fixed color wheels - Orange, Purple, Red, Green) Size: 3.6 inch x 3.15 inch x 3.15 inch height each Packaging Box x 1 (The drawing of the graffiti cover may vary a little bit but the overall pattern is similar) OUR VISION Kids excitement and imagination are our best motivation. We believe that love and surprise can be spread via this monster truck combo. We are committed to investing at least 1% of revenue to non-profit programs in developing countries, to help kids there with no toys to play with. Disclaimer CozyBomB Monster Truck is not affiliated with or endorsed by any other brands e.g Monster Jam. CozyBomB is an independent Toys Producer strive for kids' happiness.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Fantastic Toy for my Little Boys
reviews.reviewText: My son absolutely loves the CozyBomB Friction Powered Monster Trucks Toys for Boys! This set of 4 trucks is perfect for any little boy who loves playing with cars and trucks. The push and go feature makes them easy to operate and keeps my son entertained for hours on end.The set includes four different trucks, each with its own unique design and character. The vibrant colors and detailed graphics make them visually appealing and engaging for young children. They are also made with high-quality materials, which ensures durability and long-lasting playtime.What I particularly love about these trucks is that they are friction-powered, so they don't require batteries or other power sources. My son can simply push them forward, and they will race across the floor, providing him with endless fun and excitement. The trucks also have a sturdy construction, making them perfect for indoor or outdoor play.In addition, these trucks are the perfect size for little hands to grip and play with. The smooth edges and no small parts make them safe for younger children, so I don't have to worry about my son getting hurt while playing with them.Overall, the CozyBomB Friction Powered Monster Trucks Toys for Boys are a fantastic toy for little boys who love playing with cars and trucks. They are well-designed, durable, and entertaining, making them a great value for the price. I highly recommend this product to any parent looking for a fun and engaging toy for their child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My 2 year old son loves these little toy trucks. He plays with them for at least 2 hours at a time. I like that the trucks are super tough as my son is super rough himself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Zooming into the next room
reviews.reviewText: Great for your little ones. Nice size which fits in the palm of their hands and keeps them busy throughout play time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars One came broken
reviews.reviewText: The other two are amazing! My four year old grandson is super into monster trucks and friction trucks are his favorite. These do tricks and for their size are really cool. He didn't want to give the other two up to have the broken one replaced. The price was good so we are keeping them instead of returning them. He's already asked for them in more colors and we will definitely buy more. These are my husband's favorite Christmas toy also!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My grandson loves them. Very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hours of fun
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 2 year old grandson for when he stays at my house. What an awesomeproduct! Comes with 3 monster trucks, rampand barrels. They do awesome wheelies and roll over blocks put in their path. They kept his attention and he loves watching them flip over.Great quality as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are fun for the whole family!
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my grandson, 3 years old, but we all have fun with them! We race them to see who has to pick up the toys. 😁

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 2 toddler boys and 6 year old daughter love these trucks! So much that I bought them a second set!
I had thought I was buying 1 monster truck but turned out to be 4 for the price. My 3 year old son really like the toy, so I have no reason to complain.
My 2 year old son loves them. We gave him as a gift when we had our second son.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great toy for young boy for xmas
Sind so stark, dass sie auch Steigungen bewältigen und überall drüber fahren! Achtung Finger...nicht dazwischen kriegen, der Push-Motor hat ordentlich Kraft, macht Spaß!!
Están bonitos solo que muuuy chicos, la vdd en las fotos q ponen con niños se ven más grandes
